abstract.p: Lee DH, Lim SC. Sinonasal Sarcoidosis [published online ahead of print December 27, 2011]. Otolaryngol Head Neck Surg. doi: 10.1177/0194599811433277.

body.p: The authors have retracted the article “Sinonasal Sarcoidosis” by Dong Hoon Lee and Sang Chul Lim because of its prior publication in the Korean Journal of Otorhinolaryngology-Head and Neck Surgery (Korean J Otorhinolaryngol-Head Neck Surg. 2008;51:938-941).
